column2: "...<%me>? What are you doing here? This is a restricted area."
"What am I saying? No use pointing it out. The rules don't apply to either of us."
"It seems there's a Photoner ruin here. We're here to study it. Or maybe use it..."
"Hm? What is she? I don't know either. Nor do I need to."
"Everything she's told me has come true, and she's saved me over and over. I'm fine with not knowing."
"It's never been a problem, so I don't care about the details. It's irrelevant."
"...at least, that's what I've always thought. But that's changed."
"I thought I'd always be alone, that I'd never have anyone else to talk to."
"But then you came along, and I realize that my thinking was mistaken."
"I... didn't even try to understand. To ask questions."
"...about ARKS, about her, nor even about myself..."
"So when this is all over, there's so much I want to learn."
"Reading, conversing, seeing, exploring... I want to find out just how much I don't know!"
